item.title: Tax and Price Updates for Apps, In-App Purchases, and Subscriptions
item.description: Ã°ÂŸÂŒÂ The App Store is adjusting prices for apps and in-app purchases due to recent tax and exchange rate changes. The Philippines and Vietnam have introduced new VAT and personal income tax rates for developers.
